message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $12000. Considering its exceptional attributes, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $15000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior quality. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our premium product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.
